item.description: Use your locally running AI models to assist you in your web browsing

item.title: open-webui /open-webui
item.description: User-friendly AI Interface (Supports Ollama, OpenAI API, ...)

item.title: Bin-Huang /chatbox
item.description: User-friendly Desktop Client App for AI Models/LLMs (GPT, Claude, Gemini, Ollama...)

item.title: yamadashy /repomix
item.description: ğŸ“¦ Repomix (formerly Repopack) is a powerful tool that packs your entire repository into a single, AI-friendly file. Perfect for when you need to feed your codebase to Large Language Models (LLMs) or other AI tools like Claude, ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Perplexity, Gemini, Gemma, Llama, Grok, and more.

item.title: Mintplex-Labs /anything-llm
item.description: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, and more.

item.title: mendableai /firecrawl
item.description: ğŸ”¥ Turn entire websites into LLM-ready markdown or structured data. Scrape, crawl and extract with a single API.

item.title: microsoft /terminal
item.description: The new Windows Terminal and the original Windows console host, all in the same place!

item.title: lobehub /lobe-chat
item.description: ğŸ¤¯ Lobe Chat - an open-source, modern-design AI chat framework. Supports Multi AI Providers( OpenAI / Claude 3 / Gemini / Ollama / Qwen / DeepSeek), Knowledge Base (file upload / knowledge management / RAG ), Multi-Modals (Vision/TTS/Plugins/Artifacts). One-click FREE deployment of your private ChatGPT/ Claude application.

item.title: unslothai /unsloth
item.description: Finetune Llama 3.3, DeepSeek-R1 & Reasoning LLMs 2x faster with 70% less memory

item.title: infiniflow /ragflow
item.description: RAGFlow is an open-source RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) engine based on deep document understanding.

item.title: langgenius /dify
item.description: Dify is an open-source LLM app development platform. Dify's intuitive interface combines AI workflow, RAG pipeline, agent capabilities, model management, observability features and more, letting you quickly go from prototype to production.
